tree_bot_color.label: CarbonBot color
tree_bot_color.help: Allows you to set the color of the opening button and the carbon information displayed inside the CarbonBot.

tree_bot_side.label: CarbonBot position
tree_bot_side.help: Allows you to set the position at which the CarbonBot will be displayed.

tree_bot_details_activated.label: Display a link to a 'Learn More' page
tree_bot_details_activated.help: Allows you to define whether or not you want to display a link to the 'Learn More' page.
tree_bot_details_activated.warning: You must configure this link in the ClimateKit Configuration page.

tree_bot_corner.label: Shape of the corners of the CarbonBot
tree_bot_corner.help: Allows you to define the shape of the corners of the CarbonBot.

tree_bot_mobile_activated.label: Display the CarbonBot on mobile sites
tree_bot_mobile_activated.help: Allows you to define whether or not you want to display the CarbonBot on mobile sites.
